level.heading: Notification of coverage and benefits.
level.text: All individual and group health benefit plans shall contain statements, in easily readable type and in easily understandable language, approved by the Commissioner, to inform policyholders and beneficiaries of the coverage and benefits provided or offered pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-242 substituted "health benefit plans" for "health insurance policies".
